se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api

Class FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.FileUtils

  • public final class FileUtils
extends Object
    A suite of utility algorithms for use with Files and related structures.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FileFilter CHARACTER_DATAFILE_FILTER
      A FileFilter which identifies file types normally holding character data content.
      static List<String> CHARDATA_FILE_SUFFIXES
      A list containing file suffixes of files normally containing character data, implying that the content of such files can normally be manipulated using TokenParsers.
      static FileFilter DIRECTORY_FILTER
      A FileFilter which accepts directories only.
      static FileFilter FILE_FILTER
      A FileFilter which accepts files only.
      static String FILE_SEPARATOR
      The file separator ("/" on unix, "\" on windows).
      static String LINE_ENDING
      The line ending string.
      static FileFilter MODULE_NAME_FILTER
      A FileFilter which accepts Maven module directories only (i.e. directories containing a 'pom.xml' file).
      static FileFilter NONEXISTENT_OR_EMPTY_DIRECTORY_FILTER
      A FileFilter which accepts nonexistent or empty directories.

    • Field Detail

      • LINE_ENDING

        public static final String LINE_ENDING
        The line ending string.

      • FILE_SEPARATOR

        public static final String FILE_SEPARATOR
        The file separator ("/" on unix, "\" on windows).

      • DIRECTORY_FILTER

        public static final FileFilter DIRECTORY_FILTER
        A FileFilter which accepts directories only.

      • FILE_FILTER

        public static final FileFilter FILE_FILTER
        A FileFilter which accepts files only.

      • MODULE_NAME_FILTER

        public static final FileFilter MODULE_NAME_FILTER
        A FileFilter which accepts Maven module directories only (i.e. directories containing a 'pom.xml' file).

      • NONEXISTENT_OR_EMPTY_DIRECTORY_FILTER

        public static final FileFilter NONEXISTENT_OR_EMPTY_DIRECTORY_FILTER
        A FileFilter which accepts nonexistent or empty directories. For this FileFilter, an "empty" directory implies that no directories or files are present within a successful candidate. All files except those whose names starts with "." are considered files.

      • CHARDATA_FILE_SUFFIXES

        public static final List<String> CHARDATA_FILE_SUFFIXES
        A list containing file suffixes of files normally containing character data, implying that the content of such files can normally be manipulated using TokenParsers.

      • CHARACTER_DATAFILE_FILTER

        public static final FileFilter CHARACTER_DATAFILE_FILTER
        A FileFilter which identifies file types normally holding character data content.

    • Method Detail

      • getCanonicalPath

        public static String getCanonicalPath(File fileOrDirectory)
        Gets the canonical path of the supplied (non-null) File.
        Parameters:
        fileOrDirectory - A non-null File object.
        Returns:
        The canonical path to the supplied fileOrDirectory.

      • makeDirectory

        public static File makeDirectory(File rootDirectory,
                                 String relativePath)
                          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Creates all intermediary directories from the rootDirectory to the leafDirectory given by the relativePath supplied.
        Parameters:
        rootDirectory - The existent or nonexistent rootDirectory.
        relativePath - The relative path of directories to make.
        Returns:
        The directory just made.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the leafDirectory (or any of its intermediary directories) could not be created.

      • getPomModel

        public static org.apache.maven.model.Model getPomModel(File aPomFile)
        Acquires a Maven Model from the supplied POM file.
        Parameters:
        aPomFile - A non-null pom.xml File.
        Returns:
        The Maven model converted from the supplied aPomFile.

      • getModuleNames

        public static List<String> getModuleNames(File reactorDirectory)
        Given a directory within a Maven project reactor, list the names of all subdirectories containing a 'pom.xml' file. These directories typically correspond to module names within a reactor POM found in the supplied reactorDirectory.
        Parameters:
        reactorDirectory - An existing directory.
        Returns:
        The names of all subdirectories to the provided reactorDirectory where a file called "pom.xml" exists. The names of these directories should typically be used as module names within a reactor pom located within the supplied reactorDirectory. No validation of any found pom.xml files (consistency, well-formed-ness etc.) are done within this method.

      • getSimpleArtifact

        public static SimpleArtifact getSimpleArtifact(org.apache.maven.model.Model aModel)
        Extracts a SimpleArtifact from a Maven model.
        Parameters:
        aModel - The Maven Model from which to extract the SimpleArtifact data.
        Returns:
        A SimpleArtifact wrapping the data found in the supplied aModel.

      • exists

        public static boolean exists(File fileOrDir,
                             boolean isDirectory)
        Identifies if the supplied fileOrDir exists.
        Parameters:
        fileOrDir - A non-null File.
        isDirectory - if true, the fileOrDir is assumed to be a directory - and otherwise a file.
        Returns:
        true if the supplied fileOrDir exists and is of the type indicated by isDirectory.

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(File aFile,
                             String data)
        Writes the supplied data to the given File.
        Parameters:
        aFile - The non-null File to write data to.
        data - The non-null data string to write.

      • readFile

        public static String readFile(File aFile)
        Reads all (text) data from the supplied File, returning it as a String. All line feeds are converted to System.getProperty("line.separator").
        Parameters:
        aFile - The non-null File to read data from.
        Returns:
        The content of the supplied File.

      • readFile

        public static String readFile(String resourceURL)
        Reads all (text) data from the supplied resource URL, returning it as a String. All line feeds are converted to System.getProperty("line.separator").
        Parameters:
        resourceURL - The non-empty resource URL to read data from.
        Returns:
        The content of the supplied resource URL.

      • listFilesRecursively

        public static SortedMap<String,File> listFilesRecursively(File aDirectory)
        Maps the relative path of all files found under the supplied aDirectory to the files themselves. Note that this operation consumes considerable amounts of resources (memory buffers) when mapping large file trees. Therefore, it is wise to confine the aDirectory to smaller file trees.
        Parameters:
        aDirectory - A directory under which all Files are mapped.
        Returns:
        A non-null SortedMap relating the relative paths of all Files found under the supplied aDirectory to the Files themselves.
